idea-plugin.name: QuickLook
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin that brings support for QuickLook in the debugger, similar to Xcode's content renderers. This is currently somewhere between alpha and beta, and I would be happy to receive bug reports on the projects Github page. Currently supported are the following types:

  • UIImage, NSImage, NSBitmapImageRep
  • UIImageView, NSImageView
  • UIColor, NSColor
  • UIView, NSView
  • UIBezierPath
  • Custom classes that implement debugQuickLookObject and which return one of the above objects

    The plugins source code is available under the MIT license on Github
